description: Incorrect implementation of security logic in JWT/MFA by a single Senior Developer could lead to critical vulnerabilities. The senior developer is a bottleneck for all security tasks.
mitigation_strategy: Mandate pair programming on all security-critical tasks (MFA, JWT, Password Reset). Schedule third-party penetration test.
contingency_plan: Have a security consultant on retainer for emergency code review and remediation.
monitoring_trigger: Security tasks slipping by more than one sprint.

description: Failure of the asynchronous job scheduler for permanent account deletion could lead to non-compliance with GDPR.
mitigation_strategy: Implement a Dead-Letter Queue (DLQ) for the job processor and configure critical alerts for any message landing in the DLQ.
contingency_plan: Develop a documented runbook for manually reprocessing failed deletion jobs from the DLQ.
monitoring_trigger: Any message in the account deletion job's DLQ.
